name: montecarlo_demo__tai
description: A simple electron app to demonstrate how the Monte Carlo method is used

scripts.build-all: electron-packager . MonteCarloDemo --overwrite --out=build-releases && electron-packager . MonteCarloDemo --overwrite --out=build-releases --platform=win32 --arch=x64 && electron-packager . MonteCarloDemo --overwrite --out=build-releases --platform=win32 --arch=ia32

author: Camille BRIAND <dev@camillebriand.fr>
